thread.title: Harapan urges action over Sea Games tender scandal
thread.title_full: Harapan urges action over Sea Games tender scandal

title: Harapan urges action over Sea Games tender scandal
text:
More 
Federal opposition pact Pakatan Harapan wants authorities to probe reported irregularities in the tender process for the supply of gymnastics equipments for the 2017 SEA Games. 
"Harapan fears there may be elements of graft and abuse of power in the applications and approvals process of the tender. 
"There are several questions that must be answered transparently and responsibly by the Youth and Sports Ministry with regard to the matter," the pact said in a joint statement released by Harapan component parties today.
